game.name: Parsector
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In Parsector, you play the role of a starship captain at the outer rim of the galaxy. Begin the game in your own fighter ship, accept missions, mine space metal, and build your way up to a capital flagship while you dodge Imperial blockade drones & avoid the Starshadow Guild's harvester crews.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Parsector, you play the role of a starship captain at the outer rim of the galaxy. Begin the game in your own fighter ship, accept missions, mine space metal, and build your way up to a capital flagship while you dodge Imperial blockade drones & avoid the Starshadow Guild's harvester crews.
